name: Snow Battle Princess Sayuki
overview: Heavenly Guardian is a scrolling shooter similar to the Pocky and Rocky series. The game's story involves Sayuki, the game's protagonist, who must save her beloved from a curse by finding the correct ingredients for a cure. The game can be played either singleplayer or multiplayer with another person. Sayuki is also followed by Toto, her pet snow rabbit, which can shoot freezing shots at enemies.The player can move Sayuki (or Sayuki's younger sister Koyuki in multiplayer). In two player mode, it is a contest to see which of the sisters can destroy the most ghosts and collect the most snowballs in their path. There is also a boss attack you can play once you beat a boss.
